name: Project 51
description:
Welcome to Area 51's testing chambers. Here u will be pushed to your limits by trying to survive waves upon  waves of our finest test dummies. You can do so by playing as a cold blooded killing machine (quite literally) or a super human with our most powerful handheld weapon made to date!

Project 51 is a game made inside TAFE for leaning and showing that a team can work together and make a small game. The aim of the game is to survive as long as you can by using one the of the two playable characters.

=-=-=-= Controls =-=-=-=

Movement = W A S D

Jump = Space

Shoot = LMB (Fully Auto)

Melee = RMB

Reload = R

Special Ability = Q (Hold)

Pause = Esc

Scoreboard = TAB 

=-=-=-= Credits =-=-=-=

Mitchell Heath (TheOriginal201): Lead Modeler, Sound Designer, Animator, Art Design

Jordan Huynh: Modeler

Ashley Johnson (ShadowHuntress): Team Leader, Lead Art Design, 

Kyle McNeill: Visual Effects, UI Art Design 

Ewan Zimmermann (YeetusMaximus7): Lead Programmer, Modeler, Prototyping, UI
